TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TypeCodeDomSerializer extends System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase

summary.span: 将对象序列化为新类型。

span.span: Serializes an object to a new type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类与 执行相同的任务，但通过此类序列化对象会定义一个新类型。The class performs the same tasks as a , but serializing an object through this class defines a new type.

summary.span: 将给定类型声明反序列化。

span.span: Deserializes the given type declaration.
The root object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法反序列化先前序列化的代码类型声明。The method deserializes a previously serialized code type declaration. 下表显示了默认实现执行的任务。The following table shows the tasks default implementation performs. |任务Task|描述Description| |----------|-----------------| |区分大小写检查Case Sensitivity Checks|实现搜索 服务，以确定是否应将成员视为区分大小写或不区分大小写。The implementation searches for a service to decide if it should treat members as case sensitive or case insensitive.| |语句排序Statement Sorting|Init 方法中的所有成员变量和局部变量均存储在一个表中。All member variables and local variables from init methods are stored in a table. 然后，init 方法中的每个语句都会添加到根据其左侧分组的语句集合，因此，对特定变量的赋值或操作的所有语句都将在该变量下进行分组。Then each statement in an init method is added to a statement collection grouped according to its left-hand side, so all statements assigning or operating on a particular variable are grouped under that variable. 不包含语句的变量将被丢弃。Variables that have no statements are discarded.| |反序列化Deserialization|根据变量对每个变量的语句集合进行反序列化。The statement collections for each variable are deserialized according to the variable.| 下表显示 方法所需的服务。The following table shows the services the method requires. |服务Service|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| ||虽然不是绝对必要，但使用服务（如果可用）来确定序列化是否应区分大小写或不区分大小写。While not strictly necessary, the service, if available, is used to determine if the serialization should be case sensitive or case insensitive.| ||如果反序列化过程中名称表中不存在对象，则会对 进行查询。If an object does not exist in the name table during deserialization, a query for is made. 如果此查询成功，则检查该对象的容器。If this query succeeds, the container is checked for the object. 容器还可用作组件所需的任何容器参数的内置。The container is also used as a stand-in for any container argument needed by components.|

span.span: or is .

The value to use for serialization.

summary.span: 返回存储用于序列化成员的语句的方法。

span.span: Returns the method where statements used to serialize a member are stored.

returns.span: 用于为给定成员发出所有初始化代码的方法。

span.span: The method used to emit all of the initialization code for the given member.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回为给定成员发出所有初始化代码的方法。The method returns the method to emit all of the initialization code for the given member. 默认实现返回一个空的构造函数。The default implementation returns an empty constructor. 如果要为多个值返回相同的方法，则应返回该方法的相同实例。If the same method is to be returned for multiple values, the same instance of the method should be returned. 您可以使用 字典记住您创建的方法。You can use the dictionary to remember methods you have created. `typeDecl` 参数还可用于添加基础结构方法。The `typeDecl` parameter can also be used to add infrastructure methods. 例如，如果想要为每个对象发出一个单独的方法，则需要使用一种方法来依次调用所有这些方法。For example, if you want to emit a separate method for each object, you need a single method that calls all of these methods in turn. 可根据需要将此方法添加到代码类型声明。This method can be added to the code type declaration as needed.

abstract member Serialize : System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager * obj * System.Collections.ICollection -> System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration override this.Serialize : System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager * obj * System.Collections.ICollection -> System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration

param.span: 用于序列化的序列化管理器。

Can be or empty.

summary.span: 通过创建定义根的新类型声明将对象根序列化。

span.span: Serializes the object root by creating a new type declaration that defines root.
A that defines the root object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法会序列化给定的根对象和可选的成员集合以创建新的类型定义。The method serializes the given root object and optional collection of members to create a new type definition. 如果 `members` 集合包含值，则会序列化这些值。If the `members` collection contains values, these values are serialized. 值本身可能会序列化为成员变量或局部变量。Values themselves may serialize as either member variables or local variables. 通过在名为 `GenerateMember`的对象上搜索扩展器属性来确定这一点。This determination is done by searching for an extender property on the object called `GenerateMember`. 如果 `true`，则生成一个成员。If `true`, a member is generated. 否则，将生成局部变量。Otherwise, a local variable is generated. 为方便起见，`members` 集合可以包含根对象。For convenience, the `members` collection can contain the root object. 在这种情况下，根对象还不添加为成员或局部变量。In this case, the root object is not also added as a member or local variable. 返回的类型的名称是从根对象的名称获取的（如果它是命名对象）。The name of the returned type is taken from the root object's name, if it was a named object. 如果不是，则从根类的简单类型名称中制造一个名称。If not, a name is fabricated from the simple type name of the root class. 下表显示 方法的默认实现所执行的任务。The following table shows the tasks performed by the default implementation of the method. |任务Task|描述Description| |----------|-----------------| |上下文种子设定Context Seeding|序列化上下文用包括 和 的数据初始化The serialization context is initialized with data including the and | |成员序列化Member Serialization|接下来， 将遍历所有成员并调用 。Next, walks all of the members and calls . 由于序列化是 中的找机会，因此这可以确保不会执行序列化。Because serialization is done opportunistically in , this ensures that serialization is not done twice.| |根序列化Root Serialization|接下来，将对根对象进行序列化，并将其语句添加到语句集合中。Next, the root object is serialized and its statements are added to the statement collection.| |语句集成Statement Integration|序列化所有对象后， 方法将对语句排序并将它们添加到从 返回的方法。After all objects are serialized, the method orders the statements and adds them to a method returned from . 最后，构造一个构造函数，用于调用从 返回的所有方法。Finally, a constructor is fabricated that calls all of the methods returned from .| - 下表显示 方法放置在上下文堆栈上的对象。The following table shows the objects the method places on the context stack. |实例Instance|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||此序列化程序。This serializer. 派生类可能会发现向此类添加公共属性很有用。Deriving classes may find it useful to add public properties to this class.| ||正在创建的类型。The type being created. 大多数对象不需要直接访问此。Most objects do not need direct access to this.|
